title: When is the Google Pixel 6 series launching?? & Can we expect India Launch as well?? URGENT
content:
I am a then-proud owner of a Google Nexus 6P who did enjoy some of the best features Google had to offer back then. My phone has now degraded quite ALOT in terms of performance. I wish to get a new device way sooner than expected because my Phone is literally dying on me. So a Big question to Google Pixel Team, WHEN IS THE PIXEL 6 SERIES LAUNCHING??? AND CAN WE EXPECT IT TO BE AVAILABLE IN INDIA AS WELL OR I AM SUPPOSED TO CRY OVER IT???????? 
From - A true Google Fan
